Perplex: Reality? I ran to the rescue, seen Zeni hurt, and fell over. AH! It
was reality!

Perplex frantically searches or Zeni.

Perplex: What happened!?

Technosis: Right here, in the ship, Perplex.

Perplex: Oh...

Perplex ran into the ship.

Technosis: No worries, I'm taking care of him.

Perplex: But it's in my nature! I'm supposed to take care of him, now! Are
you okay, Zeni?

Zeni: My back hurts.

Perplex: See?

Technosis: I'm taking care of it, isn't that right, Zeni?

Zeni: Yes, Land Mine.

Perplex: He seems really happy.

Zeni: What about Trinity?

Technosis: She's going to be okay.

Perplex: All of this happened while I was gone!?...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>

Subject: Re: MeowMix


> ::Aerotaur::
>     "It was probably reality but don't worry," He says to Perplex.  He
turns
> back to Technosis.  "I haven't heard of you, Land Mine, I was just
> acknowledging your name."
>
